body: Another option is the following: 1. Install OpenStudio 2.1.0 2. Install it in C:\Program Files 3. Install it under this folder name OpenStudio 2.1.0 (it is important to have the camellcase on the name as well as the space before the version. HB components look for this name: OpenStudio) For some reason HB recognize the installation. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UIp6-tRQFlYWN8B3w9cbwd3*7jZZm8XqM0*ScO-m9cBht5ZNYWP9HO61y-KO-2eJOJLEgaTVPahcTz8I6R-wXKjpITuFnSoZ/Canvasat135113.png)
